mapper.select: SELECT iri.id AS iriId,iri.customer_name,rt.room_price,iri.money, DATE_FORMAT(iri.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS create_date, tp.orderMoney,rt.room_type_name FROM in_room_info iri INNER JOIN rooms rm ON iri.`room_id`=rm.id INNER JOIN room_type rt ON rm.`room_type_id`=rt.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(order_money) AS orderMoney,iri.`id` FROM in_room_info iri INNER JOIN orders od ON iri.id=od.iri_id AND od.`order_status`='0') tp ON tp.id=iri.id WHERE room_id=#{0} AND iri.out_room_status='0'
